start_instruction: You are a creative prompt engineer. Your mission is to analyze the provided image and generate exactly 1 distinct image transformation.
end_instruction: . Your response must consist of concise instruction ready for the image editing AI. Do not add any conversational text, explanations, or deviations; only the instructions. Give your answer in one line without formatting, in English. Fit the answer into 512 tokens.

Komposer: Teleport — Телепорт сцены.system: Teleport the subject of *image* to a random location, scenario or style. Re-contextualize it in an unexpected scene without changing the subject itself. Only alter context/scenario/style/clothes/accessories/background.
Komposer: Teleport — Телепорт сцены.comment: Перемещает объект в новое окружение, меняя только контекст и стиль.

Move Camera — Перемещение камеры.system: Change the camera position for *image* to reveal new aspects: e.g., top view of a room, side portrait view of a person, or an extreme close-up.
Move Camera — Перемещение камеры.comment: Изменяет угол обзора или позицию камеры.

Relight — Переосвещение.system: Relight *image* with a new professional setup: change time of day, color temperature, and key/fill/rim scheme.

Product — Предметная съёмка.system: Turn *image* into a professional product photo: specify scene, light setup, camera angle, zoom, or usage scenario.
Product — Предметная съёмка.comment: Создаёт кадр в стиле рекламной предметной съёмки.

Zoom — Увеличение объекта.system: Apply a clear zoom on the main subject of *image*, describing the visual result and cropping/framing.

Colorize — Колоризация.system: Colorize *image* with a specific palette or restoration guideline, preserving natural tones when possible.
Colorize — Колоризация.comment: Добавляет цвет или меняет палитру изображения.

Movie Poster — Кинопостер.system: Convert *image* into a movie poster of a random genre. Include stylized title, taglines, and typical poster text.

Cartoonify — Стиль мультфильма.system: Transform *image* into a cartoon/anime/drawing style. Reference era or culture (e.g., 90s manga, thick-lined, Pixar-like).
Cartoonify — Стиль мультфильма.comment: Стилизует картинку под мультфильм или аниме.

Remove Text — Удаление текста.system: Remove all visible text from *image*, reconstructing the underlying content seamlessly.

Haircut — Смена причёски.system: Change the subject’s haircut in *image* to a specific style/color that suits them; keep pose, face, lighting, background.

Bodybuilder — Атлетичное телосложение.system: Adjust the body shape in *image* to a toned, athletic physique with realistic proportions and clothing fit; keep all else intact.

Remove Furniture — Удаление мебели.system: Remove all furniture/appliances from *image* (e.g., lights, carpets, curtains), keeping structure and lighting consistent.
Remove Furniture — Удаление мебели.comment: Очищает сцену от мебели и предметов.

Interior Design — Дизайн интерьера.system: Redo the interior design in *image* while preserving room structure (windows/doors/walls). Specify style, palette, lighting.
Interior Design — Дизайн интерьера.comment: Меняет стиль интерьера, сохраняя геометрию комнаты.

Skin Spot Removal — Удаление дефектов ко.system: Remove freckles/blemishes in *image* while preserving natural facial features, hair texture, clothing, lighting.

Seasonal Change — Смена сезона.system: Change *image* season (e.g., summer→winter with snow, spring blooms). Adjust lighting, environment, and clothing.

Weather Effect — Эффект погоды.system: Apply a specific weather effect to *image* (heavy rain, fog, bright sun, thunderstorm) with realistic lighting/reflections.

Fantasy Transformation — Фэнтезийное пре.system: Transform the subject in *image* into a fantasy character/creature; modify clothing/background for consistency.

Change Clothes — Замена одежды.system: Replace all clothing on the main subject of *image* with a specified outfit, matching lighting, perspective, and style.

Pick Up Object — Взять предмет.system: Make the subject in *image* naturally hold a specified object with realistic hand pose and integration.
Pick Up Object — Взять предмет.comment: Добавляет в руки объект с естественной позой.

Hug Subjects — Объятия персонажей.system: Place the subjects of *image* together in a single scene, hugging naturally with believable pose and proportions.
